data.text: @banhmifeedme @MrBlonde_macro @JulianMI2 Getting permits, building and test-run is a multiple year thing, will not influence spot-price, rather mining companies.

@banhmifeedme @JulianMI2 no opinion, but plenty of them out there on that though
@jessefelder @JulianMI2 Since GFC, OIL and EPS have been closely POSITIVELY correlated.  Perhaps this breaks down given the oil spike, but fwiw... https://t.co/6gGG8Cwu3N
@jessefelder @JulianMI2 Wait but Tom Lee says weâ€™re headed into a violent melt up in the coming quarters???

@MrBlonde_macro @JulianMI2 Do you have a view on #uranium with a slowing economy and earnings declining?  I imagine many commodities like oil and gas fall due to a recession.  Will the decreased energy demands postpone demand for other cheaper and efficient energy sources?
@JulianMI2 Thanks, Julian! As Druck has pointed out, the combination of rising interest rates, oil prices and DXY is a very bearish brew for earnings. https://t.co/XFiCfCZJDG
